metadata.synopsis: Zevlor's last conversation with the player before the battle begins. He explains that he's turned up to help, and brought some other tiefling veterans with him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with the group outside Enter dialogue with Zevlor

0.speaker: Zevlor
0.text: The survivors of Elturel stand ready for your signal - Hellriders one and all.
0.context: NodeContext: Referring to himself and the other tiefling veterans he's brought to help.

1.speaker: Zevlor
1.text: I thought the hells were behind me. But now I'm ready to walk into worse.
1.context: NodeContext: Referring to himself and the other tiefling veterans he's brought to help.
